abstract_summ: An epidemic of acute respiratory syndrome in humans, which appeared in Wuhan, China in December 2019, was caused by a novel coronavirus (SARS-CoV-2) This disease was named as "Coronavirus Disease 2019" (COVID-19) The vaccine against the disease is being developed in about 90 institutions worldwide . The experiences and lessons encountered in the previous SARS and MERS vaccine research can be used for reference in the development of the new vaccine .
